TITLE: Appendix C – Top 10 PHA Target Shortlist (Southeast)

Appendix C – Top 10 PHA Target Shortlist (Southeast)
Criteria: mid-sized agencies in AL, GA, FL (north/central), NC, SC, MS with solid
operations and leadership likely to engage on non‑recourse development and developer-
fee structures.
